name: ROBASSEMBLY
description:
KNOWN BUG:

Please play in full screen (1920*1080), as otherwise the game won't work.

Hard life being a robot when there's no more humans to exterminate... Well, looking for new experiences, you decide to shoot some of your toaster friends, and guess what, you can even shred them apart and use their rest to kill more and better !

HOW TO PLAY: 

When playing you will first have to create your character. To do that, simply click on the top to choose the part you want to modify, then drag and drop the part you wish to equip from the right to your character on the left. Each robot part has specific attributes you can discover on your own. Once ready, click play!

You move with WASD and shoot with both hands with left and right click. There are 2 levels in this build, the second one is accessible from the right of the first level (by walking on the purple square).

You can either play on your Windows computer or in your browser.

Thank you for playing and have fun,

agourk & hhyyted
